name: Black Larry Bird
description: Black Larry Bird by Mr. Mack’s Snacks is a special cross of Mr. Mack's Black Domina and the powerhouse, Gelato #33. This strain hits with an intensely heady buzz on the onset that smooths out into a deep, relaxing body high. If you have plans or things to do, this strain is not for you. The comfortable couchlock is a great option for gamers, cinephiles, and patients suffering from insomnia, lack of appetite, and anxiety.
attributes_title: Tingly, Uplifted, Creative, Euphoric, Focused, Eye Pressure, Headaches, Lack of Appetite, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Headache, Paranoid
